name: RobustTechHouse
description:
We are your strategic eCommerce, Mobile and FinTech technology partner based in Singapore. 
At the fundamental level, we believe in using technology to co-create solutions with our clients. But at heart we are innovators, engineers and designers eager to bring the latest technologies to market and realize the potential of these technologies.
We are advised by technology, financial, insurance experts with deep experience in their fields including members of CFA, CAIA, FRM, PRMIA, Society of Actuaries and Casualty Actuarial Society in Singapore with many years of global experience in Trading, Portfolio Management, Stock Analysis, Insurance related modeling and Risk Management.
 
 
READ MORE...
